title: Cherry Blossom Blooming Status Color Palette — bbgcolors
text: name string color information gather

title: Cherry Blossom Blooming Status Color Palette — bbgcolors
text: Values can following: "" Pre-bloom "bloom0", "pre", "prebloom" First bloom "bloom1", "first", "first_bloom" Peak bloom "bloom2", "peak", "peak_bloom" Post-peak bloom "bloom3", "post", "postpeak_bloom"

title: Cherry Blossom Blooming Status Color Palette — bbgcolors
code: bbgcolors("all")   require(ggplot2) #> Loading required package: ggplot2 ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width)) +     geom_point(color = bbgcolors("first"))

what: Brooklyn Botanic Gardens Cherry Blossom Status — bbgdata
title: Brooklyn Botanic Gardens Cherry Blossom Status — bbgdata
text: data set containing historical data Brooklyn Botanic Garden.

title: Brooklyn Botanic Gardens Cherry Blossom Status — bbgdata
Brooklyn Botanic Gardens Cherry Blossom Status — bbgdata
text: data frame 27 rows 3 variables: date date bloom status alt full genus species tree name tree tree species id unique integer ID bloom one four bloom states: "Prebloom", "First Bloom", "Peak Bloom", "Post-Peak Bloom"

title: Brooklyn Botanic Gardens Cherry Blossom Status — bbgdata
text: https://www.bbg.org/collections/cherries

title: Brooklyn Botanic Gardens Cherry Blossom Status — bbgdata
text: data serves archive visual map cherry blossom trees official website shows.

title: Brooklyn Botanic Gardens Cherry Blossom Status — bbgdata
code: bbgdata #> # A tibble: 3,328 × 5 #>    date       alt                                  tree                id bloom  #>    <date>     <chr>                                <chr>            <dbl> <chr>  #>  1 2025-04-14 Prunus ‘Taki-nioi’                   taki_nioi          163 First… #>  2 2025-04-14 Prunus pendula ‘Pendula Rosea ’      pendula            128 Peak … #>  3 2025-04-14 Prunus pendula ‘Pendula Plena Rosea’ yae_beni_shidare   126 Peak … #>  4 2025-04-14 Prunus × sieboldii                   sieboldii          160 First… #>  5 2025-04-14 Prunus ‘Hata-zakura’                 hatazakura         106 First… #>  6 2025-04-14 Prunus ‘Ariake’                      ariake             154 First… #>  7 2025-04-14 Prunus ‘Ukon’                        ukon               162 Prebl… #>  8 2025-04-14 Prunus × sieboldii                   sieboldii          161 First… #>  9 2025-04-14 Prunus ‘Fudan-zakura’                fudan_zakura       107 Post-… #> 10 2025-04-14 Prunus ‘Shirotae’                    shirotae           153 First… #> # ℹ 3,318 more rows

title: Tree Positions — treepositions
text: Coordinates help visualize tree gardens.

title: Tree Positions — treepositions
text: data frame 151 rows 6 variables: id_full unique ID tree tree tree species id ID number tree style CSS position styling information top number percent top left number percent left

title: Tree Positions — treepositions
text: https://www.bbg.org/collections/cherries

title: Tree Positions — treepositions
code: treepositions #> # A tibble: 151 × 6 #>    id_full              tree                id style                   top  left #>    <chr>                <chr>            <dbl> <chr>                 <dbl> <dbl> #>  1 pendula_82           pendula             82 position: absolute; …  21.5  3.27 #>  2 pendula_78           pendula             78 position: absolute; …  21.5  0    #>  3 ukon_162             ukon               162 position: absolute; …  36.1 53.6  #>  4 ukon_155             ukon               155 position: absolute; …   1.2 81.1  #>  5 taki_nioi_163        taki_nioi          163 position: absolute; …  40.2 45.4  #>  6 shogetsu_140         shogetsu           140 position: absolute; …  80.3 69.4  #>  7 sieboldii_161        sieboldii          161 position: absolute; …  38.2 58.2  #>  8 yae_beni_shidare_126 yae_beni_shidare   126 position: absolute; …  13.6 75.1  #>  9 horinji_157          horinji            157 position: absolute; …  85.9 38.6  #> 10 dawyckensis_90       dawyckensis         90 position: absolute; …  86.8 33.4  #> # ℹ 141 more rows
